explains: n. [核]示踪物；追踪者；描图者；（铁笔等）绘图工具
wordGroup: tracer gas 示踪气体；探漏气体；检测气体
isotopic tracer 示踪同位素；同位素指示剂；示踪物
radioactive tracer 放射性示踪剂，放射性指示剂

sentences.en: The tracer types represented in ITracer are
sentences.cn: ITracer 中表示的跟踪程序类型

sentences.en: I'll start by creating a sample stylesheet to apply the tracer to.
sentences.cn: 首先我将创建一个样本样式表，对其应用跟踪程序。

sentences.en: Carbon monoxide is a good tracer for moving smoke plumes, even across large distances.
sentences.cn: 一氧化碳可以用来追踪烟尘羽的移动情况，即使经过遥远的距离。
